alert.note: Alert for Harrison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 8:19PM CST until January 11 at 12:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Wolf River Above Gulfport affecting Harrison County. Biloxi River Near Lyman affecting Harrison County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING TO EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wolf River above Gulfport. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening to early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Bells Ferry Road will begin to flood. There will be water over the access road just upstream of the bridge and the road will become impassable very quickly. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 6.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 7.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 8.0 feet tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.0 feet on 01/24/2019. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lix. Click on the Rivers and Lakes menu for forecasts and observations. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning around 830 AM CST.Wednesday afternoon at 230 PM CST.
